normal.speaker: Timmie
normal.line: I am no one... just left me alone.

normal.speaker: Timmie
normal.line: The cities are too loud. The forest is quiet.

normal.speaker: Timmie
normal.line: You're moving too heavy. They can hear you a mile away.

normal.speaker: Timmie
normal.line: People are... complicated. The woods are simple.

taunt.speaker: Timmie
taunt.line: Step on the wood... and you will never be found.

taunt.speaker: Timmie
taunt.line: The forest is my domain, you are now under my shadow.

taunt.speaker: Timmie
taunt.line: I know your weakness…and when I strike, you’ll never see it coming!

taunt.speaker: Timmie
taunt.line: You'll never even hear the arrow that ends you.
